biotools.summary: Contact Map Web Viewer (CMWeb) is an online tool for studying basic properties of residue-residue contact formation and contact clusters. CMWeb can used to visualize contact maps, link contacts and display them in 3D or multiple sequence alignments, predict residue contacts, or calculate various contact statistics.
